Steak

Steak is a dish made from a cut of beef that is typically grilled, pan-fried, or broiled, and is known for its rich, meaty flavor and texture.

View Recipe

Lasagna

Lasagna is an Italian pasta dish made by layering flat pasta sheets with cheese, meat, and tomato sauce and then baked until golden and delicious.

View Recipe

Spaghetti

Spaghetti is a type of long, thin pasta that is typically boiled and served with a variety of sauces, such as tomato, meat, or cream-based sauces.

View Recipe

Carbonara

Carbonara is a classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti or other pasta, eggs, cheese, and bacon or pancetta, creating a creamy and savory sauce.

View Recipe

Alfredo

Alfredo is a rich and creamy pasta sauce made with butter, heavy cream, and parmesan cheese, often served with fettuccine pasta.

View Recipe
